name: desafio-anlix
description: Desafio para vaga de emprego na Anlix

scripts.start: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && ts-node-dev --transpile-only --ignore-watch node_modules --respawn src/server.ts
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Pablo Froes <pablofroes@outlook.com>
